meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I whiled away the hours reading a good book.
meanings.sent2: She whiled the afternoon by painting a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent3: The cat whiled around lazily in the sun, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: As the storm raged outside, she whiled inside, safe and cozy.
meanings.sent5: The children whiled happily in the playground, their laughter filling the air.

meanings.sent1: The whiled garden was a peaceful retreat from the busy city life.
meanings.sent2: They found a whiled spot by the river to have a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The whiled room was decorated with soft colors and comfortable furniture.
meanings.sent4: The whiled atmosphere of the cafe made it a favorite spot for locals.
meanings.sent5: The whiled music playing in the background added to the relaxing ambiance of the spa.
